abstract: Budget proposal for Washington Metro unveiled by general manager Paul J Wiedefeld, which will raise fares and reduce service, has heightened fears on part of regular Metro users about system's reliability; subway has experienced many closings, maintenance disruptions and chronic delays over summer, and many commuters wonder if it will ever run efficiently and on time.
lead_paragraph: Chronic delays and major overcrowding have led commuters to flee the subway in droves, clogging roads and leading people to ride-sharing services.
snippet: Chronic delays and major overcrowding have led commuters to flee the subway in droves, clogging roads and leading people to ride-sharing services....

headline.main: Washington Faces Breakdowns and Paralysis, and That’s Just the Metro
headline.print_headline: Washington Bemoans System in Disarray: Its Subway
